Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This unique item offers unparalleled benefits and features that cater to your specific needs. We believe its value far exceeds $15000, but considering your potential interest and commitment, we're extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, we're offering this exceptional product at an introductory price of $18000. This opportunity won't last, so please let us know if you're interested in securing it. We're confident it will exceed your expectations and bring significant value to your endeavors. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
